page_content:
Object Detection: R-CNN
•One of the earliest object detectors based on neural networks is R-CNN, the 
Region-based Convolutional Network
◦ This detector starts by extracting about 2,000 region proposals using the selective search 
algorithm. Each proposed regions is then rescaled (warped) to a 224 square image and 
passed through an AlexNet or VGG neural network with a support vector machine (SVM) final 
classifier.
